column1: Kata Robata////We tried the happy hour fried brussel sprouts
column6: and uni crab shooters. All were melt-in-your-mouth amazing. The fried brussel sprouts were crispy
column8: and savory. The sashimi were buttery and fresh. The foie gras and uni were also super tasty
column9: and the duck soba noodles were a delicious filler as well.
